name: Western Heat in Winter – Indoor fitness & training in groups (Please register)
description: This indoor program focuses on group fitness and cricket training during the off-season.Players engage in structured sessions that enhance both physical fitness and technicalskills, preparing them for the outdoor season. It’s an excellent way to stay in form anddevelop new strategies in a supportive, team-focused environment.
schedule: Tuesdays and Thursdays from 5 PM to 7 PM

name: Individual Training
description: Tailored to each player’s unique needs, our one-on-one coaching program is designed tofine-tune specific skills. Whether a player needs to improve their batting, bowling, oroverall game, this personalized approach ensures focused attention and rapid progress.
schedule: Tuesdays and Thursdays from 5 PM to 7 PM

name: Unlock the game for free! Register your school or college for our cricket programs today
description: To register for free cricket programs for your school or college, please send us your inquiries through the 'Contact Us' option
schedule: Tuesdays and Thursdays from 5 PM to 7 PM
